review: My toilet was constantly running i called to have it fixed. They came up to the room in about 10 minutes which i thought was very satisfying and fixed the problem. Then after the next flush the toilet was back to constantly running and it was about 1130 at night now so i wasnt calling again. So i rigged the back of the tank to fill up once then flushed and reshut the water off. The next morning had to continuously turn the water on and off while the restroom was being used. We were headed to Disneyland so i was not going to wait for maintenance to come "fix" the problem. So shut the water off and we left. Then once we got back did the same thing over. Shutting the water off and on saved them 2 days of wasted running water. Called the people down stairs to give them the heads up that the water is shut off so it doesnt run while we check out. She said okay i will make a note of that on your account. Went down to check out| nothing was noted on my account that the bathroom was bad. Lady apologizes and gives me a $50 dollar discount. Okay fair fine whatever. BUT this is the part that rubs me wrong. While i was laying in bed the second night before i fell asleep i looked up and the fire alarm is wrapped in plastic. May not be a huge deal but i have been in a hotel where there was faulty wiring in the room a few down from me and their room filled with smoke luckily they had a fire alarm that went off and evacuated the floor. So the "what if" plays in my head. Who checks the rooms??
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: It was the worst hotel to stay in ever| the room was not as described in the pictures and way smaller| the cleanliness was zero| bathroom was like public bathroom| old cracked and unclean| doesn’t worth the money| I checked out first thing in the morning since I’ve arrived midnight| disregard the bad smell inside the room.
name: Hilton Anaheim

It needs a returb and a proper clean between roomGuests.

review: Our room was not ready...sometimes understandable.. The greet staff tried to up-sell me on a different room rather than accommodating...must be a new sales program. Our room had a dead remote control for the TV| burned out light bulbs and unlike just about all the rest of the world| no WIFI unless we were HH members. Really??? Even roadside motels offer free WIFI. Lost me back to Marriott.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I liked the location of the property and the amenities offered. I didn't like that we were unable to get the type of room that we requested and that housekeeping did not come to our room until the 3rd day of our trip.

review: We enjoyed it.  Location was perfect and all of the staff were super helpful and nice.
We plan to stay again next year.  We were there for business and we were put in a quiet zone.  Cool
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: The carpet in the room is looking very old.House keeping personal are not doing their job in providing the daily needs of the room.The Hotel is charging many items falsely .I advice the guests to their final bills carefully.I stayed 4 days there for attending a medical conference.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Amazing stay we will definitely be back
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Front desk was very nice. Good proximity for Disneyland. Clean rooms| cable tv| swimming pool and water slides/play activities for the kidos... amazing room price... starbucks in the lobby...  very nice amenities and lobby... this was our second visit| looking forward to the third .. the only con is the valet price - 26bucks (unlimited in/out) is a little steep but still well worth it considering the room bargain (valet ppl are extremely nice). Highly recommend staying. 9/10.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Property is relatively no-frills business oriented hotel.  Staff were friendly and helpful| very responsive. It's very convenient to take the ART shuttle to and from Disneyland Resort (used a 3 day pass)| which was the reason for our stay| and it was great to see the fireworks from our room (as advertised).  The pool area and room seemed dated/tired and bathroom lacked towel bars and was not ideally arranged for use by a family of 4.  But it suited our purposes well.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: We have been staying here last couple times we came to Disneyland and most likely will again next time. They have a Starbucks| bar with good drinks| great customer service everywhere on the hotel grounds| and honestly anything that was needed. If they had free parking for guests it would’ve been perfect but sometimes we can’t have everything. Thank you so much for everything Hilton team!
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Hotel is massive and a pain in the butt to get even from the elevator to your room. Not worth the price. Rooms need a deep clean and a renovation.

review: Looks great from outside. Absolutely awful on the inside. This hotel does not have free wifi in hotel rooms| they charge $13 per day for wifi. They also have nasty tap water in their rooms with an unpleasant coming from the sink drain. If you want drinkable water| you'll need to go to the Starbucks in the lobby| but they close every day at 4pm! Not to mention the water temperature at this hotel is awful. The shower water temperature will constantly fluctuate from warm to cold every minute| making showering an unpleasant experience. As a person passing through the lobby| I would call this a 4 star hotel. The one good experience I've had was getting an early check in. As a guest staying at the hotel| it's a 2 star hotel at best. Do yourself a favor and stay somewhere else.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Great hotel with awesome amenities| 15 min walk to Disneyland
name: Hilton Anaheim

name: Hilton Anaheim

review: It was nice and clean and easy to check in and out. What I wasn’t really a fan of was having to pay $14 to use the fitness center. No smart TV? I stayed at the Marriott right across last year and walked around inside the Hilton and thought it was much nicer so that’s the reason I booked with Hilton this time around but I should have gone with Marriott with the nicer room and bigger TV with smart tv function

It was a little overwhelming but the staff was friendly and very clear on how to make my way around the hotel and the area. The guy at the desk even gave me a breakfast voucher for switching my room even though it wasn’t that big of a deal| so that was very nice! I will definitely be staying here again when I get the chance.

review: Booked a room for me and my boyfriend . The lady that helped us did not let me know that rooms with one king size bed were fully booked . We get to the room unaware of the situation and are in a room of two double beds and I think as a great leader and great customer service you should let your customers know these kind of things so we don’t have to worry and feel like we made a mistake . I also feel like customer service should also smile more and show there customers that there happy for us to stay at the amazing Hilton hotel.

Wish they had more kid friendly things to do on our down time hanging out at the hotel especially the pool area which was smaller than i thought. Plus side was early.check in with no fees as well as easy to get around the area if u wanted too by car. Maybe wish they had deals to lighten the cost on parking or even for Honors members but i know thats a norm and not an amenity.  Overall great stay which is why we keep.coming back

The bathroom door was a slider with no lock and did not have a perfect seal.  Our fridge in our room did not work but we had maintence come and try to fix it but they could not so they brought in another fridge.  There was no microwave in the room also.  The lobby was amazing but the room lacked in Charm.

Additionally| the Hilton insisted that I had to be charged $21 for parking. Although I explicitly informed the attendant upon check-in that I would prefer to pay as I exited the parking lot| it was added to my room bill. The total cost upon departure would have been only $16.

review: We were visiting to attend a family member's wrestling match and go to Disneyland. We have stayed at this property 5 or 6 other times over the years and it is a nice hotel.  I marked service as average| due to the length of time it takes to check-in.  This is something I have commented on over the years and it has never been addressed.  We stood in line for 15 minutes with only 5-6 people in front of us.  The hotel had 3 counters open to check in guests and it was just slow.  This experience would not deter me from staying there again| just plan to wait in line for a while when checking in.

review: Well. Let me just say| I'm not a fan of Hilton in general. I don't like their business model (over charging you for every little thing). Having to pay for basic Internet at $12 per day is just insane. I would also say that it was a bit misleading. The amenities listed fitness center and indoor pool should be clearer. The fitness center is not free. It's $15 per day. The indoor pool is inside the fitness center and it's for 16 and older. So| my 4 and 6 years old were stuck to swim in the outdoor pool which they didn't mind at all.Parking was fine compared to other facilities in the area. The hotel was very busy| so expect the service to be the same| quickly get in quickly get out. However| the staff were professional at all the time. The person that was keeping our room was very nice and professional.The first day| the valet person who I also think serves as security or some sort of gate keeper| instructed us to go directly to the parking if we are not planning to use the valet service. This was strange and really unnecessary. We had lot of baggage to whole and we needed help. So we returned back and used the front entrance instead. The following days| I just ignored them and passed through them. They didn't like it for sure.Since Disneyland was not our only destination| it was challenging moving through the traffic. Expect one to two hours to get to anywhere else. By LA standards| this is normal.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Our experience was great. The staff was great and knowledgeable about any questions we had. Our room was clean and the view was spectacular. We went around Christmas time so it was a little cold at the pool but my kids still had a great time. Pool was heated. This hotel is located close to a lot of great places to eat. We will be going back next summer for sure.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Door handle was broken upon our arrival and sitting on bathroom sink counter from 1st to last day| cleaning personnel did nothing but clean around it. Thermostat in room needs to be looked at/ it was either too hot or too cold and no way to adjust it to proper temperature. Last day cleaning personnel didn’t show up to clean our room until nearly 5:30PM. We had already had a full day an just wanted to rest so we just asked for trash to be taken out and for fresh towels. No reason people should be cleaning that late when check in is at 4PM.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Spur of the moment decision to treat my grandchildren to a stay at the Anaheim Hilton.  Got a great rate for 1 night| the munchkins had a great time swimming in the pool.  My highlight was room service.  I had the most wonderful person who was extremely patient and kind while I got the order in for the kids and the gentleman who delivered was exceptional.  Customer service is extremely important to me and I have to say that the Hilton delivered.
It was a great stay and I will definitely return.  Thank you staff at the Hilton!  You were great!!!
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: It’s my first and worst experience with Hilton. I called Hilton 3 days in advance to know if they provide Microwave in the room and they told me I can request one which I did. I called  Hilton on my day of my checkin around 7 pm  PDT   as I was running late due to traffic and also enquirer about the microwave| they told me it would be there in the room. I finally checked in before 12 am and when I reached  the hotel room there was no microwave and there was cold in the room. Though I was tired after driving for 10 hours and went down to know where’s the microwave and also requested for blankets as it was too cold in the room and I tried adjusting the temperature which didn’t work. The front desk executive told me it would’be there in 15-20 mins plus there would be charge waited  for an hour and again went down to check on microwave and blankets and it was around 1:30 so this time I asked for a manger and explained him the situation. I could only get one blanket and no news on microwave and after waiting till 2am I tried sleeping by putting the jackets on. I requested for microwave since my daughter was sick So we can give her something warm. So due to extreme cold in the room my daughter started coughing and I had to call my doctor. The Manger didn’t bothered to call metocueck how are things though they were terrible. Again I went down in the morning as asked for a Senior person who can understand my concern. I spoke to Fred- Assistant Director Front desk operation. Finally I

review: It’s my first and worst experience with Hilton. I called Hilton 3 days in advance to know if they provide Microwave in the room and they told me I can request one which I did. I called  Hilton on my day of my checkin around 7 pm  PDT   as I was running late due to traffic and also enquirer about the microwave| they told me it would be there in the room. I finally checked in before 12 am and when I reached  the hotel room there was no microwave and there was cold in the room. Though I was tired after driving for 10 hours and went down to know where’s the microwave and also requested for blankets as it was too cold in the room and I tried adjusting the temperature which didn’t work. The front desk executive told me it would’be there in 15-20 mins plus there would be charge waited  for an hour and again went down to check on microwave and blankets and it was around 1:30 so this time I asked for a manger and explained him the situation. I could only get one blanket and no news on microwave and after waiting till 2am I tried sleeping by putting the jackets on. I requested for microwave since my daughter was sick So we can give her something warm. So due to extreme cold in the room my daughter started coughing and I had to call my doctor. The Manger didn’t bothered to call metocueck how are things though they were terrible. Again I went down in the morning as asked for a Senior person who can understand my concern. I spoke to Fred- Assistant Director Front desk operation. Finally I

Guest services refused and made no attempt to change room on day one of four because of all the issues persisting. Staff rude. Hilton will hunt you down for money but won’t accommodate your complaint. They do this to their Hhonors members!

review: Let me start off by saying I have stayed at many Hilton property’s and always enjoyed my stay but from the start at this property it was horrable I called tore about an early check in the person who answered the phone was not friendly acted more like he was annoyed and bothered so not a very good start but I well say the room was nice clean great view and the people at the front greeting and opening the door where very friendly and the only people who asked how I was later on when I called about a letter check out and To see about an issue wiTh my rentle car since they have an enterprise there once again the person on the other line was not present rude befor I even finished addressing what I needed he hung up like I finished so had to call back overall not happy with my experience and we’ll not be returning to this hotel

review: Nice hotel and room. We enjoyed our stay there. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable. Room service was fast and food was great. The bar and buffet restaurant in the lobby were great and convenient. My only concern was this...we stayed on the 7th floor and the floor of the hall was noticeably bowed and slightly slanted. Our room floor was also slightly slanted lol. Not sure what the means but it worried me a lil bit lol. Other than that everything was great.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: The hotel lobby area was nice| but the room felt old and shabby. The hotel is very large and the hallways are very long and felt a little dreary. We ordered a drink from the bar which was very expensive| as was room service| but that is to be expected at most hotels. If I were to stay again| I would definitely upgrade to a nicer room.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I love how the hotel just feels safe. The staff is great. The location for Disneyland is perfect. I had a day to explore Santa Ana (friend who lives there insisted i visit there) and it was super close. Packing House is so close (Look it up and GO!) I will be back for another stay soon =]

review: I have previously given a statement regarding my stay. The low light would be the semen stains on the headboard which I did not discover until the middle of the night as I was tired when I first entered the room from a long day at Disneyland with my family.  It appears they were more stains on the dust ruffle on the west side of the bed near the flightellipses Disgusting .  For the price that I paid I would’ve expected more especially under the Hilton name. But apparently on the fifth floor and the 300 wing the gas around is valued as the room was rather shabby| lacking a microwave|  couch table etc.    when I call the concierge about the fact that the ice machine on my floor was not functioning| I thought he might send a snap to me| but instead he told me to search the other wing of the floor  for another ice machine.  I also find it funny that the Wi-Fi is not free unless you’re a special member to the Hilton hotel franchise. I’ve stayed at many hotels of lesser status than Hilton with much nicer rooms and better amenities.   It just seems in less I spent $400 a night I wouldn’t have a room that I would expect staying at the Hilton. It seems it and I was considered riffraff as I was using Hotels.com and getting cheaper rooms. I’m assuming that’s what the fifth floor is for at least a 300 wing.  I suppose I expected too much. Free Wi-Fi perhaps some type of continental breakfast or at least some coffee.   There was no couch| the tv was tiny and the bathroom was shabby.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: The staff was wonderful.  Clean and comfortable room. The food was awesome.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Charging for parking was a major negative. I've stayed at other hotels nearby that do not charge for parking.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: It was super easy to check in and check out. Loved it and will stay again in the future.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Overall great......some rooms are a little outdated.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Hotel is in need of a remodel...the rooms although comfortable are very dated. Also the ice machine on my floor did not work.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Our experience was close to wonderful: The Bell Captain services at checkout (December 2nd) was outstanding (name tag says “DJ”). Our only inconvenience was upon our arrival (check-in date| December 1st). Although we have the DMV California Disabled Placard| the Vallet Parking staff did not allow us to park in a Disabled parking spot near the main entrance| stating it’s reserved for Vallet Parking only. They told us we need to go to the multi floor parking building (which I did). I called the police to confirm the rules| and they said if I have the placard| the hotel cannot stop us from using it| regardless of its location. They were willing to come for a formal complaint| but I said I would try to resolve it by myself. I then explained this to the hotel night manager| and she gave instructions to hotel staff to finally allow us to park there. Then a pizza delivery person parked his vehicle there and I had to wait till he returned| to then move my vehicle. All staff should be trained and instructed properly| and point out to not give priority to vallet customers over regular parking customers. This made us get to sleep much later than otherwise| as it was already way past midnight when we arrived at the Hilton Anaheim. Thanks.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Day one: Live roach in the bathroom| dead spider on the ceiling.
Day two:  Live Spider in the bathtub.
Day three: Two live mosquitos(?).  The door to outside had never been opened.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Great staff all around but the rooms were very out dated. First room tried to stay but three hours into sleep there was so much banging from the elevators we couldn’t sleep and asked to be moved which thankfully they allowed. First room didn’t even have the sheets tucked in| there were cobwebs in both the bathroom and main room. Tv was small and old. Bathroom door would not shut all of the way and everything has a slight yellow tinge to it and the ac vent wasn’t fully attached to the wall. Second room was slightly better ie the bathroom door shut| no cobwebs and not loud banging from the elevator but still for the Hilton that is suppose to be third largest in the US and for the prices we paid sooooo disappointing and gross. Now the pics on their site show pretty great spots and I agree their lobby and amentities at awesome but I can’t sleep in the lobby. Also the breakfast there was almost 30 per person| food was really good but pretty pricey.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I’m really surprise on the condition of this hotel| since it is Hilton after all. It’s oretty fun down| the room was old and the walls in the bathroom had some part that needed to be repaired. The caulking on the tub is gross. The staff at the parking booth has different rules and not friendly at all. In short I will not stay in this hotel again| disappointing for the brand that it represent. I have to add that the housekeeping staff were very nice and helpful. They are the only reason why I rated our stay OK.

name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Overall| everything was great. We were there for Disney and after taking the bus on the first morning| we realized it was very walkable. The pool was fun though the “splash park” was crazy cold. Food court was a nice option for reasonably priced meals with the family. Service was great and efficient. The price was only 20% of what we were seeing for the park hotels so it was absolutely the best deal
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Property was nice. Onsite amenities were overpriced and not many food locations withing walking distance.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: This hotel connects to the convention center and features any of the services you may need for a productive business trip. The rooms are clean| bed comfortable| pillows fantastic and although the hotel is aging| the maintenance crew really does a great job in attempts to keep up. The lobby bar is a great place to network.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I Ioved the Starbucks and convenience of getting to Disneyland
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Great hotel| very large with a simple layout. Parking was simple and while you have to pay I still found it convenient. Enjoyed my stay and would recommend it to anyone coming to the area.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Like the location| we walked to Disneyland. The hotel looks very nice from outside| but too dark inside and gives unwelcoming feeling. Room floors kinda dirty| horrible pillows| shower is not adjustable| didn't like the water pressure| was too strong got my skin hurt from it.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Went to Disney| easy access and convenient
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Very|very comfortable beds and pillows. The bath towels were large and soft. Size and cleanliness of the room was good. There are not enough choices of restaurants in the hotel. Either very expensive or fast food - nothing in the middle. Sometimes you want to be served in a restaurant but not pay exorbitant prices. All in all a great stay.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I’ve previously stayed at this hotel and it was a great experience| however this experience was not so good. To start| when we arrived to the room| the heater was broken and there was no hot water. We let guest services know that they didn’t work| and they said that they would take care of it. Fast forward 24 hours| after a long day at Disneyland where it was raining| we came back to the room. Again no heat and there was barely any hot water. We had to use the hair dryer to blow hot air in an attempt to warm the room up. Needless to say this stay was not a good one for my family.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: My stay at Hilton was amazing! I loved the room and loved the bar/restaurant area. This hotel is so accomadating and was great for our Disneyland stay! I will forever stay at this Hilton when I visit Anaheim.

review: I’ve stayed at many Hilton’s around the world and other hotels| this by far was the worse.  For the price we pay to stay at a Hilton we should have stayed at a motel 6 or something similar to at least get a clean room! To think we upgraded to a suite because it would be nicer...Our door had a two inch gap beneath it so we can hear everything in the hall way| the towels and bathroom looked like someone else just used it| the floor/carpet was not vacuumed and the light switches did not work.

review: Lady that checked us in was awesome! Super friendly| went over & above. Room we were given was not "city view" as we booked. And they wanted to charge us extra for a pool view or Disney view. NOPE. Pool was super small for as large as this hotel is. There was ZERO seating left at the pool for us when we got there. Really like the extra games on the patio deck. Our room was small. Sink was cracked. Shower water pressure good. Walk from self parking garage to elevators to lobby to registration to your room is L O N G . Beware. Would stay again| but its a bit overpriced for what you get & self parking is $25 I think? Receptionist told us it was a 15 min walk to Disneyland. Nope- it took us 25 minutes to walk there with all the foot traffic| the crowds & all the lights you have to wait for. Its a very far walk!
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: asked for area map| but hotel staff had none. expedia failed to state that the self parking cost $21.00/day. bathroom was dirty| sliding door will not open| and safe door was giving errors upon checking in. hotel check in clerk did not provide the room asked and paid for| but gave a room facing the busy| noisy pool area instead of Lanai Deck.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: The stay was fine but the hotel bathroom wasn’t clean in our room. There sheets on one of the beds had a little stain on it as well which was disgusting to me. It’s time to upgrade the rooms. Out door pool was ghetto and pool looked cloudy. The plus side was All the Staff were Super Nice.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 8/30/18 Luxury is in the lobby. Customer service was good at check in & I was able to check out from the room.  That was nice  I was not impress with the room. Furniture was shabby. No hook in bathroom for towel. Beds were not comfortable.  No Kleenex in room.  Room was small. I checked in after midnight; tire from being at Disneyland all day.  My daughter| my friend  and I  had to settle. I check-out at 9:30 am the next morning| felt I paid too much for the stay. No time to go check out pool.  Next time I will stay elsewhere for half the price. I'm not type to pay for the big name and not enjoy the comfort.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Beds are kind of worn and we’re dipped where a person lays.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Parking is kind of pricey but there is abundant amount of room in the parking structure. There was quite a wait for check-in but in their defence we stayed the weekend of the Anaheim Fitness Expo so it was very busy. We only stayed one night in a basic room. I have stayed in this hotel multiple times before and have always enjoyed my stay. On this particular trip| when we got into our room we found a dirty used bandaid on the floor by the window| a sticky spill in the refrigerator with a half empty drink| blood stain on the comforter. Definitely below standards. I would stay again though| only because all other times I've stayed at this Hilton I have never had issues.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Plus: valet staff open your car door and the entry doors. This is a huge hotel with a ton of amenities on the inside (Starbucks| gift shop| bar| spa| pool| etc.) And near the convention center. We kind of enjoyed our stay.

Minus: We stayed for Disneyland. My fiance and I are a fit couple and on the younger side. Briskly walking| it took us about 20 minutes from the hotel lobby to arrive in Downtown Disney. I thought it was 8-9 minutes? Front desk staff are mediocre at best. They hardly cared and just wanted you to check in and out quickly. We were pointed in the wrong direction to the elevators. Starbucks...that sounded great on paper but dang| the line was out the door all 4 days we were there. Staffing issue? The hotel is on the older side| our room had a slant leading into the bathroom. My biggest issue? No Wifi! Hotels.com advertised free Wifi...but theres a catch. It's only free in the lobby. Why would I go down to the lobby around midnight to use the wifi when I was supposed to receive it as a part of my package? I thought that I paid for it already| and Hilton Hotels did not honor it.
In summary| we will not be returning. Should've stayed closer to the park in a motel| at least then the service would be warranted. First Hilton stay and probably the last.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: The hotel was beautiful and the staff was very nice but the room seemed like a small closet at the end of the hall. You have to cram into the bathroom to get through the door and close it. And the floor was at a downward slope going toward to door. Not a bad experience but I quickly figured out why I got the room for so cheap.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: I was really disappointed in this Hilton.  I choose it based on the reviews| pictures| and its location.  The remote control for the TV was duct taped together| the shower was clogged| the furniture was shabby| and the mattresses were well worn and needed to be flipped or replaced. The door to the bathroom was in the style of the sliding barn doors but there wasn't a tract on the ground so when you tried to open/close the door| it was difficult due to the thickness of the carpet.  Also| because there wasn't said tract| it did not seal all of the way so there wasn't 100% privacy.

name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 角部屋でエンジェルスタジアムとディズニーランドが見えて良かったです。テレビをつけたらウェルカムと私の名前が出て感動しました。ベッドも寝心地が良かったです。さすがヒルトンです。バスタブにお湯が溜まると良かったのですが。アメニティも充実してました。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Habitaciones muy usadas. Puertas no cierran. Frigider no funcionaba. Ventilador del baño no funcionaba. Mal olor del baño. Empleados prestan más atención a las convenciones. No se puede usar gym o piscina. Habitación necesita modernización. Problema al check-in
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: バスタブの栓が壊れて閉まらなかった。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Lo recomendaría ampliamente| personal amable y atento. Excelentes instalaciones.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: とても大きく、ディズニーランドへのアクセスも徒歩で良い
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: El hotel muy bonito| en excelentes condiciones y todo súper limpio pero la gente de recepción con un trato pésimo| que lastima porque todo lo demás está súper bien| felicidades a la gente de limpieza de los cuartos.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: ヒルトンなので期待して利用しましたが、お値段の割にはという感じがしました。
チケットはホテルで購入できますが、特に送迎もない感じであったとしても頻繁ではなく
結局徒歩で15分から20分かかります。
ホテルの環境は特にお風呂環境最悪です。水圧が弱く、それだけではなく浴槽があっても栓がないのでお湯も貯める事が出来ず。ストレスを感じました。以前パーク近くのモーテル的なホテルを利用していましたが、そちらのほうが良いような気がしました。
ホテルではWiFi無料と記載されていましたがホテルズドットコムさんには有料と書かれていてどっち？というかんじです。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Bien| instalaciones de lobby buenas| las habitaciones muy antiguas
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Hotel muy bonito con personal muy agradable| cuartos cómodos y grandes. Sin embargo no pudimos tener acceso al wifi aún registrándose.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Établissement propre ! Les chambres sont faites à fond tous les jours.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: El hotel muy bonito| en excelentes condiciones y todo súper limpio pero la gente de recepción con un trato pésimo| que lastima porque todo lo demás está súper bien| felicidades a la gente de limpieza de los cuartos.

review: ディズニー目的にアナハイムに行きました。ホテル街の中側にあってちょっと歩くけど全然徒歩圏内で良かった。大手だけあって館内も広いし問題なし。スタバが早く閉まるのが残念笑。24時間セブンが近くにあって良かった！
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 無料のWi-fiがないのが残念。
トイレには鍵をつけてほしいです。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Me gustó la atención al llegar al hotel| muy cómodo el lobby y el restaurante| además de la facilidad de traslado por la ubicación del hotel.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: チェックインカウンターやサービスカウンターの人は笑顔で対応してくれたけれど、日本語対応となっているホテルだったので、ヒルトンに決めたのに日本語ができるスタッフ（チェックインカウンター、サービスカウンター）がおらず片言の英語でやり取りをした。また、ホテル内にあるスターバックスの店では後からレシートを確認すると、注文の数を間違えて計上していて、支払いが多くなっていた。英語のやり取りがうまくいかず注文数を間違えたのではなく、商品は頼んだ数量を渡してもらったので、店員さんの計上ミスだと後から気づいた。私がその時に気づけなかったのも落ち度があるが、がっかりした。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Todo fue muy bueno| pero no incluye wi fi| o simplemente una botella de agua de cortesía.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 家族連れの方が多く、ファミリー向けという感じ。ディズニーへは頑張れば歩ける距離。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: とてもよかったです。滞在中何時でも、困ったことを相談すればすぐに来てくれました。本当にありがたかったです。
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 酒店大堂装修很不错。从电梯出来找房间找了好久，被安排在很角落很远的房间，就像迷宫一样。卫生间的浴室老旧，花洒喷头有点坏了
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: 디즈니랜드 근처의 숙박이라는 장점 빼고는 좋은 점이 하나도 없는 호텔. 오래되서 더럽고| 직원들 친절도 떨어지고| 주차비 및 숙박비 비싸고... 비추임.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: TODO ME GUSTO MUY AMABLE EL PERSONAL TODO MUY LIMPIO LA COMIDA DEL HOTEL TODO MUCHA SGRACIAS
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Excelente servicio y ubicación
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Exelente Hotel muy cerca de Disney| que es lo que estabamos buscando| muy limpio| comodo| buen precio| personal muy atento| tuve la fortuna que me entregaran la habitación antes del chek in| llegamos temprano al hotel para entrar a Disney| nos asignaron la habitación y fue muy comodo el regreso ya con nuestras maletas dentro de la habitación| sin preocupación... a descansar!!Volveré!!!
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Trevligt Hotell men lite rörigt. Med tanke på hotellets storlek och antal rum är hisskapaciteten kraftigt underdimensionerad. Långa köer för att kunna ta hiss upp till rummet.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Los cuartos ya están un poco viejos y con decoración anticuada| los baños podrían ser más grandes y cómodos| por otro lado está muy cerca de los parques y el bufete del desayuno es bueno.
name: Hilton Anaheim

review: Todo iba bien hasta que encontramos un bicho en una de las camas| seguridad subió a verificar el bicho a pesar de que se había dejado la prueba en guest services| se solicito un reembolso o algún tipo de bonificación y solo nos dieron usd$25. Muy mala experiencia
name: Hilton Anaheim
